eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN IMMEDIATE EVACUATION NOTICE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Siskiyou, CA; AT 11:48 AM ON SEP 28, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 03:41 PM OCT 02, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
WEED PD has issued an EVACUATION ORDER for Zones 5310,5420,5417,5408,5411,5414 due to STRUCTURE FIRE IN THE AREA OF MAIN/S WEED BLVD. Anyone in this area is ordered to leave now. 

For the latest information regarding this or any other emergency impacting Siskiyou County go to the ReadySiskiyou Website at www.readysiskiyou.gov
